<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set ticket status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Changes the workflow status for multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Useful for moving batches of tickets through workflow stages simultaneously.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. **StatusId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-statuses) to get available status identifiers.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → collect `TicketId` array
2. List statuses: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-statuses) → select target `TicketStatusId`
3. Bulk update: POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-status with IDs and status

**Note**: Status changes may trigger workflow rules. Ensure the target status is a valid transition for all selected tickets.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-statuses) – List available statuses
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status/\{statusId\}](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-status) – Set single ticket status

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["ticketIds","targetStatus"],"properties":{"ticketIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"description":"Array of ticket IDs to update. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets and read `Items[].TicketId`.","minItems":1,"maxItems":100},"targetStatus":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of the workflow step to apply across all tickets. Use [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-steps) to obtain `WorkflowStepId` values or read `Item.WorkflowStep.WorkflowStepId` from GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}.","example":"Resolved"},"comment":{"type":"string","description":"Optional comment to add to all tickets during status change","maxLength":1000}},"title":"BulkSetStatusRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
